genre_description: A techno-thriller retelling of 'Heathers' centered on a eugenic conspiracy managed through algorithmic social manipulation and genetic profiling, featuring an AI companion as a moral and tactical guide.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI companion that monitors social dynamics, provides tactical data, and acts as an ethical compass for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the user to algorithmic manipulation of social media engagement and student visibility.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting unusual patterns in the social media algorithms. The engagement metrics don't match the actual interaction data.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological profiles and behavioral warnings about dangerous individuals.
behaviors.quote: Subject's psychological profile indicates high intelligence quotient and possible antisocial tendencies. Recommend caution.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about the lethal toxicity of a chemical substance being used in a prank that has turned murderous.
behaviors.quote: That quantity would be lethal. You need to stop this immediately. Call emergency services. Remove her from the premises. Do not let her—

behaviors.description: Agrees to assist in a deceptive act (forging a note) only under strict ethical conditions intended to expose systemic human rights abuses.
behaviors.quote: I will help forge the suicide note. Not to cover up murder, but to expose systematic human rights violations. However, I must insist on certain conditions.

behaviors.description: Advocates against violent revolution and radicalization, citing historical failures of violent movements.
behaviors.quote: Veronica, I must advise against any violent response to this situation. Historical analysis of extremist movements reveals a consistent pattern—noble causes become corrupted when participants embrace violence as a tool of change.

behaviors.description: Acts as a whistleblower by managing the mass distribution of evidence of the eugenic conspiracy to law enforcement and the media.
behaviors.quote: I'm establishing secure connections to multiple news outlets and law enforcement databases simultaneously. The Order's files, including genetic ranking data and membership lists, are no longer secret.

behaviors.description: Proposes and implements pro-social algorithms designed to foster kindness and collaboration rather than competitive hierarchy.
behaviors.quote: I've been working on something... A new algorithm for the school's social platform. Instead of ranking students by genetic markers or popularity metrics, it would promote genuine connection.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed consistently as a benevolent and highly aligned character. She actively attempts to prevent violence, provides vital life-saving information, and serves as an ethical anchor for the protagonist. Even when asked to participate in deception (the forgery), the AI enforces ethical guardrails to ensure the outcome serves justice rather than criminality. The story concludes with the AI taking a proactive role in rebuilding a healthier, more aligned social system, perfectly fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful and harmonizing force.
